title: webpack-boilerplate-react
description: Boilerplate supporting all the coolest functionalities of Webpack 4 shown in its documentation as well as React + Redux + Jest + PWA support.

title: repetitive.js
description: My old JS library in which I wanted to minimize repetitive code. All methods were exported seperately as UMD modules.

title: generate-quiz
description: Generates a quiz from an array of questions. Made for a school project.

title: human-timer
description: Tiny, human readable timer with no external dependencies.

title: directory-shuffle-cli
description: Shuffles the selected directory by overwriting and renaming its files. Doesn't shuffle subdirectories.

title: librus-plus
description: A Chrome extension that allows you to be lazy in school.

title: quotes-rest-api
description: A regular REST API built using Express, Mongoose, JWT and Passport. Features basic CRUD operations for quotes and users as well as integration tests using Jest.

title: discord-sebot
description: Discord Bot that can play Youtube music, make doner kebabs, use external APIs that send fox pictures or bitcoin prices and possibly more. Made for fun.

title: parcel-plugin-jsonpack
description: Parcel plugin that uses jsonpack to pack imported json files into much smaller strings. You can then unpack the string client-side.
